ygData.msgSnippet: Im tired of sitting around waiting for people....its time to take matters into my own hands. Megatron, followed by Waspinator, Paddletail, Aquarious, Hell

Im tired of sitting around waiting for people....its time to take matters 
into my own hands.


    Megatron, followed by Waspinator, Paddletail, Aquarious, Hell Beast, and 
Gremlin halt. According to the scans Kitkat was a few hundred yards away at a 
base of somekind. Nighteyes was also waiting there.
    "Call Nighteyes, that little traitor will die at my hands!" Megatron 
said, brandishing his tail gun. He looked at his group, who were well amred 
and anxious to get back at Kitkat.
    "You do realize, now that youre out in the open, she can detect you on 
scans?" Hell Beast said in a very matter-of-fact way. His rivalry for 
leadership was clear.
    He said nothing in return, and then began to march. Waspinator buzzed 
next to him, "Megatron, wont wolf bot be surprized when we crush her?"
    "Of course, idiot! Thats the point! Now, Waspinator and Aquarious attack 
from above, Gremlin and Hell Beast will go from the east, Padletail and I 
shall go from the north. Now go!" Megatron barked as the Predacons split up 
and began the assult on Kitkats base. The element of surprize was a deadly 
weapon.

    Black Aracnia yelled into her comlnk, "Cyber Claw, dont bother coming 
back. I dont want you on this team anymore, personally, I think your a self 
indulged hipocrate that will get yourself killed. If I ever catch you around 
my base agian.....I will kill you myself." And then slammed down her commlink.
    "Commander?" Paralysis said, a bit nervous at her temper that had 
suddenly reappeared.
    "Quickstrike! I will give the commands around here! Not you! Now, take 
Rat Trap and question him. I want details. As for the rest of you, suit up 
and get ready for battle. The Ark isnt going to be rebuilt, not while Im a 
Predacon still breathing." She narrowed her eyes, as if to say the rise was 
over, no longer was she the compasinate female leader.....she was the cold 
bitch who wasnt going to let anything, or anyone, stand in her way.
